confident.description: Whether you're confident in the accuracy of the summary

helm_changes.description: A description of any helm values changes required for updating the chart to this version.  Should be in markdown format, and is sourced from the helm changelog.  *If there are no notes, leave this blank.*

chart_updates.description: A description of any updates to the chart itself.  Should be in markdown format, and is sourced from the helm changelog. *If there are no notes, leave this empty.*

features.description: A list of features that were added in this version.  Each should be at most two sentences, will likely be in the application release notes.

breaking_changes.description: A list of breaking changes that were introduced in this version, each should be at most two sentences, will likely be in the application release notes.
